name: Failboat x Gex: Chapter 2
description:
PLAY CHAPTER 1 FIRST IF YOU HAVEN'T ALREADY :

Failboat x Gex : Chapter 1

TRIGGER WARNING :

There are slight themes of phycological horror and some potential epilepsy warnings.

Didn't think we'd be doing another one of these but here we are...

Failboat x Gex : Chapter 2

A month after the events of Chapter 1, Failboat and Gex, along with some familiar and new faces, are set to sail on a cruise vacation for a nice escape from reality. What will the couple discover this time around, and who will they encounter along the way? Download and play to find out...

Love. Drama. Lore...? This visual novel has it all...

(TO ONCE AGAIN CLARIFY, EVERYBODY WHO WORKED ON THIS GAME DOES NOT ACTUALLY SHIP FAILBOAT WITH GEX. WHILE IT IS NOT A JOKE GAME AND TOOK PLENTY OF TIME AND EFFORT TO MAKE ON EVERYONE'S PART, WE DO NOT GENUINELY SHIP FAILBOAT WITH GEX.)
